CustomField.description: Enter a number representing the minimum total hours that must be attached to the Timesheet when submitting for approval - Total Hours field. This would be enforced only when the user submits for approval from the My Timesheet - if the hours are less than Min Total Hours - produce an error message.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a number representing the minimum total hours that must be attached to the Timesheet when submitting for approval - Total Hours field.
CustomField.label: Min Total Hours
